dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Healthcare Minister, Akmaral Alnazarova, just announced they're pushing for criminal liability for attacks on emergency staff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Healthcare Minister, Akmaral Alnazarova, just announced they're pushing for criminal liability for attacks on emergency staff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We've submitted proposals that are now being processed, including criminal liability for attacks on medical workers while they are performing their professional duties, she said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's huge. And she mentioned they're adding body cameras too, right? Like, actual video badges.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge. And she mentioned they're adding body cameras too, right? Like, actual video badges.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The minister also highlighted plans to equip paramedics with body cameras. We'll be implementing the use of body-worn video badges.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's already in Order No. 225, apparently. They're making it mandatory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's already in Order No. two hundred twenty five, apparently. They're making it mandatory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This requirement has already been added to Order No. 225, and regional governments will be responsible for allocating the necessary funding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But who's gonna pay for all that equipment? That's not cheap.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But who's gonna pay for all that equipment? That's not cheap.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: She said regional governments are responsible for funding. They're aiming to roll it out by the end of the year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She said regional governments are responsible for funding. They're aiming to roll it out by the end of the year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This requirement has already been added to Order No. 225, and regional governments will be responsible for allocating the necessary funding. I believe we'll carry this out gradually by the end of this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it sounds good in theory, but uh, will it really deter people in the heat of an emergency?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it sounds good in theory, but uh, will it really deter people in the heat of an emergency?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Well, she claims it's already working in Almaty—keeping both staff and potential troublemakers in check.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, she claims it's already working in Almaty-keeping both staff and potential troublemakers in check.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Almaty, we've already addressed this at regional ambulance stations. Wearing the badges helps keep both medical staff and potential troublemakers in check, Alnazarova added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. And this is tied to those new rules for non-critical calls starting May 1st, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. And this is tied to those new rules for non-critical calls starting May first, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's like a whole package to protect responders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's like a whole package to protect responders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But criminal liability—do we know what that actually means? Like, stricter sentencing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But criminal liability-do we know what that actually means? Like, stricter sentencing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The proposals are with the Prosecutor General's Office and Ministry of Justice now, so details are probably being worked out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The proposals are with the Prosecutor General's Office and Ministry of Justice now, so details are probably being worked out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking at a government briefing, Alnazarova called the issue "very relevant" and said several proposals have already received support from the Prosecutor General's Office, the Ministry of Justice, and the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I just hope it doesn't take forever to implement. Paramedics deal with so much aggression already.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just hope it doesn't take forever to implement. Paramedics deal with so much aggression already.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For real. If the cameras help document incidents, that's a step forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For real. If the cameras help document incidents, that's a step forward.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. Let's see if other countries take note.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. Let's see if other countries take note.
